movie.title: Kurt Cobain: Montage of Heck
movie.actors: Don Cobain, Jenny Cobain, Kim Cobain, Kurt Cobain
movie.plot: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Kurt Cobain: Montage of Heck makes a persuasive case for its subject without resorting to hagiography -- and includes plenty of rare and unreleased footage for fans.
